评论详情: Haven’t worn it out yet, but has a great look. The only thing I’ll say is I wish it came in more sizes, because it is quite long for a woman and I’ll have to create another hole for it to fit properly.

Good belt with a little flare. It’s perfect to show off some skulls without being too obnoxious. Real leather will insure a long life. I bought 2, one for an active teen and the other for a plumber and both are still going strong without falling apart
